response:
The patient presents with two distinct clinical syndromes indicating dissemination in space. Firstly, left-sided reduced visual acuity and a Relative Afferent Pupillary Defect (RAPD) localise to the left optic nerve. Secondly, left-sided appendicular ataxia (dysmetria, dysdiadochokinesia), gait ataxia, and downbeat nystagmus localise to the left cerebellum and its brainstem connections (specifically the vestibulocerebellum).

lesion_locations = ["Left Optic Nerve", "Left Cerebellum"]
